reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: These switches are overrated. The switch mechanisms break with minimal pressure. If you have to put them into some tight areas and have wires or materials putting slight pressure on the sides of the switch case, the switch will stop sliding and break. I’ve installed many dozens of these switches and the design is not as good as the ratings would have you believe. Another big problems is the slider does not slide all the way to the end of the switch, which is not intuitive and makes people wonder if they are working correctly. The manufacturer needs to fix these obvious problems and if they did then I would use and recommend these more often.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2025
reviews.title: Overrated and Problematic

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: Works perfectly, unlike the cheaper version with a blue light in it. This one dims my LED fixture without flickering down to the lowest levels. Cheaper version, although "digital" on the package failed miserably at dimming the light, it flickered at every setting but the brightest. Buy Leviton and buy once. I won't try cheapo again in switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2025
reviews.title: Dims LED with aplomb. Knockoff cheap version failed horribly and is too cheap to send back.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: I bought this to replace an outdated dimmer switch that was just turning our new dimmable LED bulbs on and off. Since installing the "Leviton Sureslide," they are now fully dimmable. The switch features a slider and a main switch, allowing you to set a predetermined brightness when turning it on and easily adjust the brightness as needed. Note to self and prospective buyers: Make sure to pick up a matching faceplate.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2025
reviews.title: Replace an outdated dimmer switch that was just turning our dimmable LED bulbs on and off

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: We purchased many of these for the house we just bought. It needed a little makeover, and these dimmer switches are an excellent addition to adjust lighting to create the right ambiance. We like the larger lever. The ones in the main stores only have the tiny little lever on the side. Our handyman likes them; "easy install". The quality is outstanding, Absolutely recommend!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2025
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: I bought this Leviton, SureSlide dimmer switch after trying, and later returning, a cheaper brand (BESTTEN). The cheaper brand did dim the lights, but it was not gradual at all. It was either on full brightness, or very dim, with nothing in the middle. And at the point it made the transition from bright to dim the light would flicker badly. At first I thought I just got a bad one, but I had two of them so tried the second one with the same unsatisfactory results. So back they went. The Leviton was $3 more, but well worth it. It dims the lights gradually and smoothly, with zero flickering. Great product. Shouldn't have wasted my time trying to save a few bucks with the cheaper ones.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.title: Works great. Smooth, even dimming with dimmable LED lights and no flickering

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2018
reviews.title: Works as advertised with LEDs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: Excellent switch for LED bulbs. It has a capacitor (or something similar) that dampens a change in current going through it. When you adjust the slider, the change in brightness has a soft ramp up time (very short but noticable). This means that small spikes in current going to the bulbs is soften eliminating flickering. Works well. You can make fine tuning adjustments on brightness all the way down to very dim, just barely on. Still, the dimmest setting should meet almost any low level lighting needs. Be aware that it doesn't feel like an expensive switch, which it isn't but I feel it does an excellent job at it's price point.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2018
reviews.title: Excellent switch for led bulbs.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton SureSlide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 6674-P0E, Black
reviews.text: Perfect for our use. Slide control works great and is steady and smooth. The lower switch allows you to set the level of dimming and keep it there when you turn it off and on again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2018
reviews.title: Perfect for our use

reviews.text: Once I figured out the wiring for a two switch room setup (two separate doors into the bathroom) I like this dimmer a lot. Very smooth operation and clean design. Dim is night light dim to full power. Quiet on/off switch. I have it operating three LED bulbs on pendants and no buzzing at all like you sometimes get with LEDs on dimmers.
